name: G14 | Tofu-Ish | Plodding
bio: Oh hi! I'm G14 | Tofu-Ish | Plodding. I'm a Train Conductor by day, and I like volunteering at the local kitten rescue shelter by night. I'm convinced that that one day cats will rule this planet. One day I'll prove it. We're so fur-tunate to have found each other!
